name: Knight Raiders
description:
IT’S TIME TO KNIGHT UP!
The once fair kingdom of Valeron is in dire peril!
Armies of demonspawn, led by the maleficent demon-prince Malfas, are destroying and demolishing everything in their path. It falls upon you to lead a brave party of knights and rid the realm of this otherworldly evil!
The people need your aid, gallant warrior!

FIGHT VILE CREATURES!
The demons might be the beginning of your troubles, but their wicked influence corrupted everything they touched! You will be fighting armies of goblins, animals under the malign demonic influence, opportunistic bandits and a plethora of other more exotic and unique enemies.

RECRUIT YOUR SQUAD!
You might start with just the valiant Commander and the brave Gladiator, but over the course of your noble campaign you’ll be able to choose among eight versatile classes, each with its own powers and skills - and each a daring knight in their own right!
Design your squad of four combatants as you see fit!

EQUIP YOURSELF WELL!
With hundreds of weapons and armors to choose from, you can make sure to have a right answer to any threat, no matter whether the situation calls for fierce offense or a sturdy defense.

CHOOSE YOUR ABILITIES!
A wide array of devastating active and passive abilities will offer you even more help and versatility in battles! Experiment with your skills and see how they complement your fighting strategy.

BUILD YOUR VILLAGE!
Construct new buildings, unlock new features, upgrade your weapons and armor; craft, research and enhance. Help your village grow from an unassuming settlement into a hardy hamlet, a true base of operations from which you’ll be able to launch effective attacks!

EXPLORE THE REALM!
Venture forth into the unknown! The only way to combat the demon threat and put an end to Malfas’ machinations once and for all is to explore all the regions that stand between you and the final confrontation. And you’ll grow stronger with each new discovery!

ENGAGE OTHER PLAYERS!
Try your hand against other players! Enter the Arena! Match your wits and tactics against live players, earn exclusive multiplayer rewards, improve your Arena rank and see how you fare in the intense, ever-changing world of PvP!

You are now all that stands between the encroaching darkness and thousands of innocent lives. Sacrifice everything for a chance at liberation. Allow yourself to be reforged in the heat of battle into something greater!

Are you up to the challenge?

PLEASE NOTE!
Knight Raiders is completely free to play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
